WRITING.TITLE: Windows 10 update, lost files and programs. Any help appreciated.
WRITING.TEXT:
I'm running windows 10, last night all was well, load up this morning and there must have been a system update. My desktop and task bar are all back to default, and the screen saver is vanilla too. Google chrome is gone. I used a chrome extension called one tab and had hundreds of tabs saved. All gone. I reinstalled there but wondered if I can get it back.
Some folders are missing too. There are no system restore points. I had some before I upgraded to windows 10, and I thought that the OS created restore points periodically for you.
Any help is greatly appreciated.
Thanks. ~~~~
